item.title: How to Train Your D̶r̶a̶g̶o̶n̶ Manager
item.description: I became a manager by accident. Here's what I wish someone had done for me and how I'm doing it differently for the next generation.

item.title: Leading Without Non-Negotiables Is Just Damage Control
item.description: Why defining your leadership non-negotiables early is critical to leading with integrity and trust.
